questions.question: Considering the overall form factor, what is the primary shape of the product container as depicted in the image?

Focusing on the textual information on the container, what is the main product described?

Based solely on the image, what is the apparent packaging style—jar, pouch, box, or other?

By observing the container carefully, what type of label is used—printed, sticker, or other?
